title: Mushroom Seasoning Powder
ingredients: - 1½ ounces dried porcini, dried shiitake, or a mixture (or ½ cup powdered)
directions: IF you’re using whole mushrooms, work in batches to grind the dried mushrooms to a fine powder in a spice grinder. Sift each batch into a storage container. Add the MSG, salt, and sugar and mix really well.
IT keeps in the pantry for up to 1 month.
